original_title: Enterrement de Vie de Jeune Fille aux Caraïbes

She's open to it all!In this earthly paradise, the three girlfriends are going to discover that pleasure has no limits. This holiday promises to be extremely hot?
title: Bachelorette Party in the Caribbean
